item.name: Parri Estate
item.description: Alice, Peter and John Phillips have established a business with a clear marketing plan and an obvious commitment to quality. The vineyard is planted to chardonnay, viognier, sauvignon blanc, semillon, savagnin, pinot noir, cabernet sauvignon and shiraz, using modern trellis and irrigation systems. In 2004 a second property on Ingoldby Road, McLaren Vale was acquired, with a second cellar door, with shiraz and cabernet sauvignon, and 70-year-old bush vine grenache. Exports to the UK, Canada, Mexico, Germany, Korea, Hong Kong, Singapore and China.
